title: Why do you do this riot

replies.body:
Mate, i've got 4 Kayle skins. Or 5. Don't even know anymore.
Haven't bought any of them. All rito "gifts". All Kayle.
I don't even play Kayle.
{{champion:10}}
gets tricked into buying a "mystery", blames riot.

Don't be angry, been disappointed in your self, cause it's MYSTERY :P
I already have 2 annie skins: Panda Annie and Annie in Wonderland
I bought a mystery skin and...oh wait, I'm too poor to afford RP...
I have 3 brand skins, all from mystery gift.
Blame the makers of the dice when you roll a 1, we are such a supportive playerbase...

I got a kass skin for 750rp, non-refundable.

The down side to getting lots of champs with ip is that there is more chance of you getting a left field skin when you mystery skin.

Part of me thinks I should have cut out the middle man and spent 975 on a skin I wanted.
u know mystery skins are pretty much gambling and when your gambling almost every time you do it ends not good for you
Oh tough luck dude, I bought a mystery skin and got Forecast Janna. So that's super cool as a support main.
